feed.title: OpenSign Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: reduce size of tooltip and adjust it's position by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/a06723ff3f0d19bb1a092e4c68d6aeaa059170fa
  • fix: document list sorting issue on scroll down in opensign-drive by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/d1e7b9a2abaac9d65874e7387e0b4741123cd391
  • fix: disable tour message for completed document by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/5a25b2d8741b73795e490d0bf4ca620fc35cb646
  • fix: signature image getting copied to initials by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/f8ba0d357bfb0c9958b4d397e965782b8a8e29e3
  • fix: show expiry date in expired document message by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/febb50c3cd08c6cbea55124f134eb5b409eafef6

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: attach digital sign to completion certificate by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/558
  • feat: display custom app logo saved by user from console app by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/560
  • feat: Improved security by generating signed download links that expire after a few minutes wherever PDF files are accessed by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/562
  • feat: implement functionality to save and fetch usage analytics by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/569
  • feat: implement custom email template of request email and completion email by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/568
  • feat: implement share button option to share recipient's sign url after finishing a doc creation using request signature flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/581
  • feat: add company and job title in user profile for modification by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/583
  • feat: add tour message for template report and opensign drive by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/584
  • feat: send custom completion mail if available by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/606
  • feat: API now supports all widgets types by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/591
  • feat: add revoke button in inprogress report to revoke/decline document by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/602
  • feat : Add new 'add recipient' button in 'request signatures' flow to add new signers in document signer's list by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/598
  • feat: add delete button in all reports and share button in in-progess report by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/599
  • fix: sorting by name issue in open-sign drive by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/553
  • fix: Expired report had issues by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/554
  • fix: Expired document message appears partially before appearing fully by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/555
  • fix: completion certificate not generating for old completed documents by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/567
  • fix: change path of favicon and manifest by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/574
  • fix: opensign-drive and template report tour message by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/609
  • fix : logo issue in guest login flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/613

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.4.2...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: text input validation issue if user did not select any validation by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/621
  • fix: text input validation issue in template flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/624

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.5.0...v1.5.1

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.5.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add support for encrypted PDF files, Images & DOCX files@prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/662
  • feat: Ability to send emails using user's own gmail account by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/630
  • feat: Add more details in completion certificate including originator details, signatures, viewed time & signed time by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/658
  • feat: User who does not have email verified will be asked to verify email id before signing any document by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/662
  • feat: Add verify email link on profile page by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/662
  • fix: text was not selectable from validation dropdown issue by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/629
  • fix: remove validation for text input widgets by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/628
  • fix: Local instance is trying to access S3 bucket with USE_LOCAL=TRUE by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/644
  • fix: login with google issue by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/664
  • fix: Ip address overlap with security level in certificate by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/673
  • fix: pdf url are not downloadable in report and PDF ui after some time by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/674
  • Fix: draftDocument.js saveFileUsage is not defined. by @daniel-mutwiri in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/678
  • fix: document loading error No PDF file specified by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/680
  • refactor: changes in subject of request signature mail by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/683
  • fix: issue of url encoded parameter in guest login url by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/676
  • build(dep): Update multiple packages by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/675

New Contributors

  • @ugoconsonni made their first contribution in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/667
  • @Zathiel made their first contribution in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/675
  • @daniel-mutwiri made their first contribution in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/678

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.5.1...v1.5.8

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: some signatures went missing when 2 or more people signed the documents at the same time by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/708
  • fix: something went wrong error in guest login when document created through Document API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/697
  • fix: issue of showing document in drafts report after creating from document API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/695
  • fix: issue of showing originator in completion certificate's signer list when there is only one signer by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/698
  • fix : integrate validation for the signature widget as mandatory. by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/699
  • refactor: update certificate generating message by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/700
  • fix: modal design of signature validation in both flow signyour-self and request-sign is not consistent by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/701
  • fix: issue of user name is visible in subject of mail instead of document title by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/702
  • fix: integrate validation for the signature widget as mandatory using API by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/704
  • refactor: change default cursor pointer to crosshair cursor pointer in debugUI by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/707
  • fix: pdf download is not working in guest login by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/709

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.5.8...v1.6.0
